entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 14 April 2023
